title: Yume de Yozora o Terashitai
description: is a single by Aqours as well as an insert song in Love Live! Sunshine!! Season 1 Episode 6, sung by Chika Takami, Riko Sakurauchi, You Watanabe, Yoshiko Tsushima, Hanamaru Kunikida and Ruby Kurosawa. It was released on September 14, 2016.
